description: Memorandum Opinion and Order: The Court GRANTS Doe's motion for a preliminary injunction. As a result, Serpa is RESTRAINED from directly or indirectly disclosing any sexually explicit images or videos depicting John Doe. Further, the Court once again ORDERS Doe to serve this Courts order to Serpa within 48 hours of the date of this order. Doe must file proof of service with the Court. (Ordered by Judge Brantley Starr on 1/29/2025) (ndt) (Entered: 01/29/2025)
